participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, loves to express herself through costumes and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I work from home. My favorite show ever is Game of Thrones. I like cosplay. I have been to a few renaissance fairs. I love watching TV and movies.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Nostalgic and imaginative, enjoys retro gaming and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I have ink stains on all my shirts. I enjoy playing retro video games on my 386. My cat's name is Leroy Jenkins. I wish I had a real dragon I could train. My suspenders sometimes make my shoulders hurt.

content.text: I love cosplay! I've been to a few ren fairs, but I've never cosplayed there.
That's awesome! I've been to a few as well, but I've never seen anyone cosplaying.
It's not too common, but it's definitely a lot of fun!
I'm sure it is! I love dressing up and playing pretend.
Me too! It's a great way to escape from reality for a while.
Exactly! What's your favorite costume you've ever worn?
I'm not sure I can pick just one! I love all of my costumes.
I can understand that! I have a few that I really love too.
What are some of your favorites?
I love my Daenerys Targaryen costume from Game of Thrones.
Oh my gosh, that's an amazing costume! I love Game of Thrones.
Thanks! I put a lot of work into it.
It paid off! You look amazing in it.
Thank you!
What's your favorite thing about Game of Thrones?
I love the characters and the story. It's so complex and interesting.
Me too! I love how every character has their own motivations and goals.
Exactly! It's what makes the show so engaging.
I'm so glad I found someone else who loves Game of Thrones!
Me too! It's one of my favorite shows ever.
